verses.verse: When <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> had <S%G2036>spoken<s%> these <S%G5023>words<s%>, he went <S%G1831>forth<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G4008>over<s%> the <S%G5493>brook<s%> <S%G2748>Cedron<s%>, <S%G3699>where<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> a <S%G2779>garden<s%>, <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1492>knew<s%> the <S%G5117>place<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4178>ofttimes<s%> <S%G4863>resorted<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>.

<S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%>, having <S%G2983>received<s%> a <S%G4686>band<s%> of men <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5330>Pharisees<s%>, <S%G2064>cometh<s%> <S%G1563>thither<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G5322>lanterns<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2985>torches<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3696>weapons<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3767>therefore<s%>, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> that should <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, went <S%G1831>forth<s%>, and <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%> ?

They <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%>. <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he . <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2455>Judas<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> <S%G3860>betrayed<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>.

As <S%G5613>soon<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> as he had <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846%G3754>them<s%>, <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> he, they <S%G565>went<s%> <S%G1519%G3694>backward<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4098>fell<s%> to the <S%G5476>ground<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> asked <S%G1905>he<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, Whom <S%G5101><s%> seek ye <S%G2212><s%> ? <S%G1161>And<s%> they <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> of <S%G3480>Nazareth<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, I have told <S%G2036><s%> you <S%G5213><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> am <S%G1510><s%> he : if <S%G1487><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> ye seek <S%G2212><s%> me <S%G1691><s%> , let <S%G863><s%> these <S%G5128><s%> go their way <S%G5217><s%> :

<S%G2443>That<s%> the <S%G3056>saying<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2036%G3754>spake<s%>, <S%G1537>Of<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> thou <S%G1325>gavest<s%> <S%G3427>me<s%> have <S%G3756>I<s%> <S%G622>lost<s%> <S%G3762>none<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2192>having<s%> a <S%G3162>sword<s%> <S%G1670>drew<s%> <S%G846>it<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3817>smote<s%> the high <S%G749>priest's<s%> <S%G1401>servant<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> cut <S%G609>off<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1188>right<s%> <S%G5621%G1161>ear<s%>. The <S%G1401>servant's<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G3124>Malchus<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, Put up <S%G906><s%> thy <S%G4675><s%> sword <S%G3162><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sheath <S%G2336><s%> : the cup <S%G4221><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> my Father <S%G3962><s%> hath given <S%G1325><s%> me <S%G3427><s%> , shall I <S%G4095><s%> not <S%G3378><s%> drink <S%G4095><s%> it <S%G846><s%> ?

<S%G3767>Then<s%> the <S%G4686>band<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G5506>captain<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%> <S%G4815>took<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1210>bound<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>,

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> was <S%G2258>he<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> gave <S%G4823>counsel<s%> to the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> it was <S%G4851>expedient<s%> that <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> should <S%G622>die<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G2992>people<s%>.

¶ <S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G4613>Simon<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G190>followed<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> so did <S%G243>another<s%> <S%G3101%G1161>disciple<s%>: <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> unto the high <S%G749>priest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> went in <S%G4897>with<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G833>palace<s%> of the high <S%G749>priest<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G4314>at<s%> the <S%G2374>door<s%> <S%G1854>without<s%>. <S%G3767>Then<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> that <S%G243>other<s%> <S%G3101>disciple<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G1110>known<s%> unto the high <S%G749>priest<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>spake<s%> unto her that kept the <S%G2377>door<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> brought <S%G1521>in<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> the <S%G3814>damsel<s%> that kept the <S%G2377>door<s%> unto <S%G4074>Peter<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> one <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G444>man's<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>? <S%G1565>He<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%>, I <S%G1510>am<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>.

<S%G1161>And<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5257>officers<s%> stood <S%G2476>there<s%>, who had <S%G4160>made<s%> a fire of <S%G439>coals<s%>; <S%G3754>for<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G5592>cold<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> they warmed <S%G2328>themselves<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2258%G2476>stood<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> warmed <S%G2328>himself<s%>.

¶ The high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G2065>asked<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1322>doctrine<s%>.

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> spake <S%G2980><s%> openly <S%G3954><s%> to the world <S%G2889><s%> ; I <S%G1473><s%> ever <S%G3842><s%> taught <S%G1321><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the synagogue <S%G4864><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the temple <S%G2411><s%> , whither <S%G3699><s%> the Jews <S%G2453><s%> always <S%G3842><s%> resort <S%G4905><s%> ; and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> secret <S%G2927><s%> have I said <S%G2980><s%> nothing <S%G3762><s%> .

Why <S%G5101><s%> askest thou <S%G1905><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> ? ask <S%G1905><s%> them which heard me <S%G191><s%> , what <S%G5101><s%> I have said <S%G2980><s%> unto them <S%G846><s%> : behold <S%G2396><s%> , they <S%G3778><s%> know <S%G1492><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> .

<S%G1161>And<s%> when <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2036>had<s%> <S%G5023>thus<s%> <S%G2036>spoken<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> of the <S%G5257>officers<s%> which stood <S%G3936>by<s%> <S%G1325%G4475>struck<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> with the palm of his <S%G1325%G4475>hand<s%>, <S%G2036>saying<s%>, Answerest <S%G611>thou<s%> the high <S%G749>priest<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, If <S%G1487><s%> I have spoken <S%G2980><s%> evil <S%G2560><s%> , bear witness <S%G3140><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> the evil <S%G2556><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> well <S%G2573><s%> , why <S%G5101><s%> smitest <S%G1194><s%> thou me <S%G3165><s%> ?

<S%G1520>One<s%> <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G1401>servants<s%> of the high <S%G749>priest<s%>, <S%G5607>being<s%> his <S%G4773>kinsman<s%> <S%G3739>whose<s%> <S%G5621>ear<s%> <S%G4074>Peter<s%> cut <S%G609>off<s%>, <S%G3004>saith<s%>, <S%G1492>Did<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1492>see<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G2779>garden<s%> <S%G3326>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>?
<S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> <S%G720>denied<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>immediately<s%> the <S%G220>cock<s%> <S%G5455>crew<s%>.

¶ <S%G3767>Then<s%> led <S%G71>they<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> <S%G2533>Caiaphas<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the hall of <S%G4232>judgment<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> it <S%G2258>was<s%> <S%G4405>early<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> they <S%G846>themselves<s%> <S%G1525>went<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the judgment <S%G4232>hall<s%>, <S%G3363>lest<s%> they should be <S%G3392>defiled<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2443>that<s%> they might <S%G5315>eat<s%> the <S%G3957>passover<s%>.

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> went <S%G1831>out<s%> <S%G4314>unto<s%> <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%>, <S%G5101>What<s%> <S%G2724>accusation<s%> bring <S%G5342>ye<s%> <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G444>man<s%>?

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> unto <S%G846>them<s%>, <S%G2983>Take<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2919>judge<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%>. <S%G2443>That<s%> the <S%G3056>saying<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G2036>spake<s%>, <S%G4591>signifying<s%> <S%G4169>what<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%> he <S%G3195>should<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>.

<S%G3767>Then<s%> <S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G1525>entered<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the judgment <S%G4232>hall<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5455>called<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1488>Art<s%> <S%G4771>thou<s%> the <S%G935>King<s%> of the <S%G2453>Jews<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>, Sayest <S%G3004><s%> thou <S%G4771><s%> this thing <S%G5124><s%> of <S%G575><s%> thyself <S%G1438><s%> , or <S%G2228><s%> did others <S%G243><s%> tell it <S%G2036><s%> thee <S%G4671><s%> of <S%G4012><s%> me <S%G1700><s%> ?

<S%G4091>Pilate<s%> <S%G611%G3385>answered<s%>, <S%G1510>Am<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> a <S%G2453>Jew<s%>? Thine <S%G4674>own<s%> <S%G1484>nation<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the chief <S%G749>priests<s%> have <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G4571>thee<s%> unto <S%G1698>me<s%>: <S%G5101>what<s%> hast thou <S%G4160>done<s%>?

<S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answered<s%>, My <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> : if <S%G1487><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> were <S%G2258><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> this <S%G5127><s%> world <S%G2889><s%> , then would <S%G302><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> servants <S%G5257><s%> fight <S%G75><s%> , that <S%G3363><s%> I should <S%G3860><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> be delivered <S%G3860><s%> to the Jews <S%G2453><s%> : but <S%G1161><s%> now <S%G3568><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> kingdom <S%G932><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> from hence <S%G1782><s%> .

To <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> end was <S%G1080><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> born <S%G1080><s%> , and <S%G2532><s%> for <S%G1519><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> cause came I <S%G2064><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> , that <S%G2443><s%> I should bear witness <S%G3140><s%> unto the truth <S%G225><s%> .
